summary: Completed comprehensive testing of password-protected secret area on Sian Appreciation page. All core functionality working perfectly including password modal, secret content unlock, and image display.
passed_tests: Main Sian Appreciation page loads correctly at /sian-appreciation
Page displays existing content (quotes, appreciation cards, jokes section)
Secret unlock button with heart/lock icon is visible and clickable
Password modal opens when clicking the unlock button
Entering wrong password shows error message 'Incorrect password'
Entering correct password 'Mia is a terror' unlocks secret content
Secret content displays 'For Sian's Eyes Only' header
Hero watercolour image displays prominently with decorative frame
Six heartfelt messages display correctly (Your Smile, Those Eyes, Natural Charisma, Wonderful Mum, Authentically You, That Adorable Scream)
Two additional gallery images display (Fun & Playful, Cat Lady Extraordinaire)
Final love message section displays correctly
Password modal close button works properly
Unlock button disappears after secret content is unlocked
Auto-rotating jokes and fun facts work properly
Back to Login navigation button present and functional
